title: Name a Game Where You Play as a Robot
description: The only bots I play with are in TF2. #gamingtrivia #portal2

transcript_chunks.text: name a game where you play as a robot name a game where you play as a robot Andre we're going to start off with you portal two Andrea says portal two portal two is our secret answer yeah that's going to give you five points that's the first time on the show that the secret answer was the very first answer that was given and so congratulations on that uh not 40 points but that's okay hey at least it's something
